portfolio.name: Modelling Diffusion in Solid-State Electrolytes
portfolio.description: Development of computational tools based on the TuTraSt algorithm for calculating self-diffusion coefficients of ions in solid-state electrolytes.

portfolio.name: Studying Fluorinated Surfactant - Polyelectrolyte Interactions
portfolio.description: Study of interactions between sodium polystyrene sulfonate and cationic surfactants to elucidate the role of hydrophobicity in polyelectrolyte–surfactant complex formation.

portfolio.name: Thermodynamics of Simple Water Models
portfolio.description: Investigation of the phase behavior and anomalous properties of core-softened water models using molecular simulations and integral equation theory.
